subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias had a goal and an assist, Martin Brodeur made 29 saves and Ilya Kovalchuk scored in his return from a groin injury in the visiting Devils’ 5-3 win over the Buffalo Sabres on Wednesday night.
snippet: Patrik Elias had a goal and an assist, Martin Brodeur made 29 saves and Ilya Kovalchuk scored in his return from a groin injury in the visiting Devils’ 5-3 win over the Buffalo Sabres on Wednesday night.
